mapper.insert: insert into handicap (Id, QiShu, Status, No1, No2, No3, No4, No5, No6, Tema, OpenTime, AutoOpen, TemaStatus, ZhengmaStatus, TemaCloseTime, ZhengmaCloseTime, IsSettlement ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qishu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{no1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{no2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{no3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{no4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{no5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{no6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tema,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opentime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{autoopen,jdbcType=BIT}, #{temastatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{zhengmastatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{temaclosetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zhengmaclosetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issettlement,jdbcType=BIT} )
